<a id="class_RenderSceneData"></a>

# RenderSceneData

**Inherits:** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [RenderSceneDataExtension](class_renderscenedataextension.md), [RenderSceneDataRD](class_renderscenedatard.md)

Abstract render data object, holds scene data related to rendering a single frame of a viewport.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Abstract scene data object, exists for the duration of rendering a single viewport.

\ **Note:** This is an internal rendering server object, do not instantiate this from script.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_RenderSceneData_method_get_cam_projection"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Projection](class_projection.md) **get_cam_projection**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_RenderSceneData_method_get_cam_projection)

Returns the camera projection used to render this frame.

\ **Note:** If more than one view is rendered, this will return a combined projection.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RenderSceneData_method_get_cam_transform"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Transform3D](class_transform3d.md) **get_cam_transform**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_RenderSceneData_method_get_cam_transform)

Returns the camera transform used to render this frame.

\ **Note:** If more than one view is rendered, this will return a centered transform.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RenderSceneData_method_get_uniform_buffer"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](class_rid.md) **get_uniform_buffer**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_RenderSceneData_method_get_uniform_buffer)

Return the [RID](class_rid.md) of the uniform buffer containing the scene data as a UBO.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RenderSceneData_method_get_view_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_view_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_RenderSceneData_method_get_view_count)

Returns the number of views being rendered.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RenderSceneData_method_get_view_eye_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector3](class_vector3.md) **get_view_eye_offset**\ (\ view\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_RenderSceneData_method_get_view_eye_offset)

Returns the eye offset per view used to render this frame. This is the offset between our camera transform and the eye transform.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RenderSceneData_method_get_view_projection"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Projection](class_projection.md) **get_view_projection**\ (\ view\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_RenderSceneData_method_get_view_projection)

Returns the view projection per view used to render this frame.

\ **Note:** If a single view is rendered, this returns the camera projection. If more than one view is rendered, this will return a projection for the given view including the eye offset.
